column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I recently needed to go to a moderately distant city .
#id=2
#text=Because it is on the other side of a local mountain range , travel in my car would be very hard on it , and I might get lost .
#id=3
#text=Fortunately there is a passenger train that goes between out two cities .
#id=4
#text=I had , before this trip , never been on any kind of train bigger than one at the amusement park .
#id=5
#text=I was very excited for this opportunity .
#id=6
#text=When I arrived at the station I was very pleased to see that the train had large windows .
#id=7
#text=While on the trip these proved to be wonderful for all of the gorgeous views provided by nature .
#id=8
#text=As my trip was a half day journey .
#id=9
#text=I stopped in the dining car for lunch , I found it highly enjoyable to eat on the train , and this also helped to distract me from the time .
#text=When I arrived in the other city I met a friend who was eager to learn about my trip .
